name: Strateos, Inc.
description: Developer of a robotic cloud lab platform designed to accelerate drug discovery and synthetic biology research. The company's platform automates chemistry, biology, and tissue analysis into closed-loop robotic labs that accelerate drug discovery programs, enabling pharmaceutical partners to rapidly and efficiently discover new drug candidates.
